News

13 January 2025
One full paper and two short papers accepted at CAIN 2025!! Pre-prints coming soon.
Full paper: Engineering LLM Powered Multi-agent Framework for Autonomous CloudOps by Rudra, Sreemaee, Adyansh, Shrikara, and Amey along with Team MontyCloud.
Short paper: Approach Towards Semi-Automated Certification for Low Criticality ML-Enabled Airborne Applications by Chandrasekar, Vyakhya and Prakhar.
Short paper: LoCoML: A Framework for Real-World ML Inference Pipelines by Kritin, Santosh and Chandrasekar.

16 December 2024
Paper accepted at ICSA 2025: LLMs for Generation of Architectural Components: An Exploratory Empirical Study in the Serverless World. Authors: Shrikara Arun and Meghana Tedla

4 December 2024
Prakhar Jain presented their work about POSEIDON at ICSOC 2024, Tunisia

22 Sept 2024
Paper Accepted at ICSOC 2024. POSEIDON: Efficient Function Placement at the Edge using Deep Reinforcement Learning. Authors - Prakhar Jain, Prakhar Singhal and Divyansh Pandey.

5 July 2024
Our students Arya, Meghana, Shrikara, Prakhar, Adyansh and Raghav were presented with the research awards of the institute for the academic year 2023-24.

7 June 2024
Best Poster Award @ ICSA! - Hiya Bhatt, Shrikara A, Adyansh Kakran.

May 2024
UKIERI-SPARC funded DigIT - Digital Twins for Intelligent Transportation Systems Project.

May 2024
Shubham Kulkarni !(MS by Research) successfully defended his thesis.

April 2024
Seven papers got accepted to ICSA 2024.
